reviewText: I love coffee and would like to get more dvds on this subject.  Interesting to learn about the different places coffee is grown and the different flavors that result.
My son is a big coffee drinker and this was one of two ('Black Coffee' being the other) DVDs we bought him for Christmas last year. He really enjoyed them both.
I can't get enough of these DVDs! If you are interested in the origins of coffee and how it is processed. this is the DVD for you.
INFORMATIVE DVD ABOUT COFFEE PRODUCTION FROM ITS EARLY BEGGININNGS TO WHAT WE HAVE TODAY.BOUGHT IT FOR A PRESENT FOR A FRIEND OF MINE THAT DOES COFFEE PRODUCTION AND SALES HE ENJOYED IT VERY MUCH.
